entry.title: Ukraine Repels Russian Drone Attacks With Help From Western-Supplied Air Defenses
entry.content: Kyiv is getting better at intercepting Iranian-made Shahed drones that Russia has relied on to damage Ukrainian infrastructure.

entry.title: Mourners Bid a Quiet Farewell to Pope Benedict
entry.content: Thousands have filed past Benedict’s body lying in state in St. Peter’s Basilica, though nothing like the enormous lines that formed for St. John Paul II in 2005.

entry.title: Ukraine Has Digitized Its Fighting Forces on a Shoestring
entry.content: Ukraine has achieved a cut-price version of what the Pentagon has spent decades and billions of dollars striving to accomplish: digitally networked fighters, intelligence and weapons.
